structure.unit: Sec. 11-2104. - TURNING AT OR BETWEEN INTERSECTIONS.

law.text: After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be unlawful to make a left turn, right turn, or a straight-through movement, respectively, at the locations set out in official Traffic Schedule No. 8, Restricted turns at or between intersections. Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, ยง11-2004
